segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so sure her brother will share those cookies with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so brave, climbing up there to get them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is missing all the fun, just standing there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, but it’s almost funny how no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could be there to see their faces when they finally get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so full of life and mischief, it’s hard not to smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is wobbling, but the girl is just waiting, completely trusting him.
segments.speaker: PAR
